snippet: United States wholesalers increased stockpiles in January by the largest amount in 13 months, even though sales dropped sharply.
abstract: Commerce Department reports that United States wholesalers increased stockpiles in Jan 2013 by 1.2 percent, highest increase in 13 months, even though sales dropped sharply.
lead_paragraph: United States wholesalers increased stockpiles in January by the largest amount in 13 months, even though sales dropped sharply.

headline.main: Inventories Up 1.2%,. Biggest Rise in Over a Year
headline.print_headline: Inventories Up 1.2%,. Biggest Rise In Over a Year
